title: signinwithgoogleauthentication
description: Test the /auth/signin POST endpoint to verify successful Google Sign-In authentication and correct response structure including success status and account details.

title: getallalbums
description: Test the /albums GET endpoint to ensure it returns a list of albums with correct properties such as id, name, emoji, and favorite status.

title: createalbum
description: Test the /albums POST endpoint to verify that a new album can be created successfully with valid name and emoji, and returns the correct status code.

title: updatealbum
description: Test the /albums/{id} PUT endpoint to ensure an existing album can be updated correctly by id and returns a success status.

title: deletealbum
description: Test the /albums/{id} DELETE endpoint to verify that an album can be deleted by id and returns a success status.

title: getphotosinalbum
description: Test the /photos GET endpoint with albumId query parameter to ensure it returns the list of photos in the specified album with correct properties.

title: addphototoalbum
description: Test the /photos POST endpoint to verify that a photo file can be uploaded and added to a specified album successfully.

title: togglephotofavoritestatus
description: Test the /photos/{id}/favorite PUT endpoint to ensure the favorite status of a photo can be toggled correctly by photo id.

title: startcloudsync
description: Test the /backup/sync POST endpoint to verify that cloud synchronization with Google Drive starts successfully.

title: searchalbumsandphotos
description: Test the /search GET endpoint with query parameter to ensure it returns relevant search results for albums and photos.
